DOC.brief_summary: PURPOSE : The purpose study investigate whether High Intensity Interval Training ( HIIT ) improve health wellbeing pre-diabetic elderly adult . In particular , specific interest describing effect interval exercise program inflammatory state immune function . DESIGN : Subjects sedentary , 65 80 year old adult , prediabetes define fast plasma glucose ( 100 125 mg/dl ) . Before 10-12 week High Intensity Interval Exercise train program subject undergo several test include : 1 ) maximal treadmill test , 2 ) Oral Glucose Tolerance Test , 3 ) muscle biopsy , 4 ) body composition , 5 ) several physical function test 6 ) health related measure include lung function , arterial stiffness several blood measure ( e.g . liver enzymes , kidney function ) . DATA ANALYSES & SAFETY ISSUES : As comparison group , data analysis consist perform pair t-tests pre post exercise training value measurement variable interest . In addition , data use provide power calculation future grant proposal . High Intensity Interval Training safe exercise modality . The regular use vigorous intensity exercise interval use extensively exercise training . In fact , exercise interval start level low short duration use maximal exercise test . They carefully slowly make challenge subject able safely tolerate . HYPOTHESIS : The investigator hypothesize HIIT result significant improvement marker inflammation , immune system marker health-related risk factor .
DOC.criteria: Age 6580 year Prediabetic Fasting plasma glucose 100 125 two separate day Able walk 2 minute without stop LDL Cholesterol ≤ 190 ; Triglycerides < 600 ; Blood Pressure ≤ 160/90 Inactive : Exercise < 2 day per week Medications : Stable use medication ≥ three month Smoker : tobacco use within last 12 month Dieting intend diet ; weight stable ≥ six month ( weight change < 5 pound ) Use confound inflammatory medication : aspirin , ibuprofen , naproxen ( NSAIDS nonsteriodal antiinflammatory drug ) History diabetes , heart disease take medication condition History hypertension ( high blood pressure ) control medication Unwillingness undergo muscle biopsy study test , continuously participate exercise train 12 week . Inability give blood continuously catheter ( please notify study nurse difficulty past blood drawn ; study nurse determine whether excluded reason ) Unwillingness conduct ALL exercise session fitness facility research study staff supervise time . Orthopedic limitation , musculoskeletal disease and/or injury Due nature study , person know joint , muscle orthopedic limitation restrict physical activity may exclude . Able decide want take part study Lack transportation exercise testing facility
